mapper.select: select post_id, mem_userid, post_title, post_content, post_writedate, post_hit, post_location, post_payment, post_review_count from wantad order by post_id desc
select mem_userid, post_title, post_content, post_writedate, post_hit, post_location, post_payment, post_review_count from wantad where post_id = #{post_id}
select mem_userid, post_title, post_content, post_writedate, post_hit, post_location, post_payment, post_review_count from wantad where ${searchtype} like '%'||#{key}||'%'

select mem_userid, post_title, post_content, post_writedate, post_hit, post_location, post_payment, post_review_count from wantad where post_title like '%'||#{key}||'%' union select mem_userid, post_title, post_content, post_writedate, post_hit, post_location, post_payment, post_review_count from wantad where post_content like '%'||#{key}||'%'
select mem_userid, post_title, post_content, post_writedate, post_hit, post_location, post_payment, post_review_count from wantad where mem_userid = #{mem_userid} order by post_id
mapper.insert: insert into wantad (mem_userid, post_title, post_content, post_writedate, post_location, post_payment, post_review_count, post_hit) values (#{mem_userid}, #{post_title}, #{post_content}, sysdate, #{post_location}, #{post_payment}, #{post_review_count}, 0)
mapper.update: update wantad set mem_userid = #{mem_userid}, post_title = #{post_title}, post_content = #{post_content}, post_writedate = sysdate where post_id = #{post_id}
update wantad set post_hit = post_hit + 1 where post_id = #{post_id}
